title: 服务器刷新报错，然后刷新不出来
author: newphp
txt_content:
这是服务器报错1.7.10的空岛服

[18:53:32 警告] An exception was thrown by a user handler's exceptionCaught() method while handling the following exception:
java.lang.NullPointerException] 
at net.minecraft.network.NetworkManager.func_150718_a(NetworkManager.java:263) ~[ej.class:?] 
at net.minecraft.network.NetworkManager.channelInactive(NetworkManager.java:112) ~[ej.class:?]

at io.netty.channel.DefaultChannelHandlerContext.invokeChannelInactive(DefaultChannelHandlerContext.java:237) [DefaultChannelHandlerContext.class:?]

replies.author: 苏狐awa
replies.txt_content: 在这之前你有装什么插件吗？

replies.author: 苏狐awa
replies.txt_content: 如果有的话你试试把这个插件卸了再试试？
